Easilly, one of the best stories of all time in gaming.

not a fan of the 2 weapon limit, i honestly think it was stupid and irrational
other than that the combat is fun and the story is pretty fahkin good (can be a bit melodramatic at times tho.)
Good game, doing this for a sticker pack
Ахуенная игра с ахуенным сюжетом! Советую поиграть!

剧情很好  不过游戏性有点低，就算是1999难度也太简单了
只能同时装备两把武器的设定有点影响游戏的流畅性，改成三把能大幅缓解这种现象

武器升级系统本来是一个可以下功夫弄的地方，不论技能还是枪械，升级后应该给人一种更好更爽的体验，但是制作组这方面不太到位
Very nice story with a plot twist
among my top games. recommended.

[h1] Belo simulador de como explodir sua mente [/h1]
[spoiler] apenas se você entender a história	[/spoiler]

Tirando isso,é um excelente jogo,porém,não vale os noventa conto cobrado,pegue apenas se tiver em promocao ,com esse dinheiro vc compra mt jogo igualmente foda que pode até te dar mais horas de jogo.

Os gráficos são meio cartunescos,porem,não possuem cell shading,e tbm nao sao mt simples,mas são muito bonitos.
A jogabilidade é boa,porém pra mim os poderes tinham q ficar no scroll e a mira no botão direito,pq vc vai acabar mirando mais doq usando poderes
A dublagem é muito boa,os atores bem escolhido,Troy Baker faazendo o bom trabalho de sempre.
Como dito anteriormente,a história é de arrepiar o C* da b*unda,magnifica ,com plot twist magnifico
Basicamente,antes de jogar esse jogo eu considerava The Last of Us o melhor jogo q ja joguei,em seguida GTA V em segundo e Metal Gear phantom pain em terceiro,mais agora TLOU e BioUVA(apelido carinhoso que só os fortes vao entender) estão empatados.
Basicamente Este jogo é magnifico,mas por ser uma experiencia que nao vai segurar vc por muito tempo nao vale o preço,pra mim o maximo que poderia ser cobrado é quarenta reais.
Fantastic Game
Maybe the best game I've ever played. The story is one you can't stop thinking about.
Got the game on sale, finished it in one day, so I'd say it was a pretty good story. But I'm sure it's not healthy to binge play a game like I did.

totally beautifull graphics
good story and nice gameplay. 

you must try this game. 

trust me

J'avais déjà acheté ce jeu a l'époque sur 360 mais pouvoir le redécouvrir sur PC est un pur bonheur, des années après la qualité graphique et le style unique de ce jeu sortent encore.

One of my most enjoyed games in my library. The art style never fails when it comes to Bioshock games, and the twists and turns of the game kept my mind wanting more until the very end. What a tweest! :D

Çekici mekan tasarımları, harika bir konsept, oldukça iyi oturtulmuş karakterler ve harika bir hikaye... Kesinlikle bir baş yapıt.
Ayrıca şok eden sonlu oyunlar listesine kesinlikle dahil edilebilecek bir oyun.

I didn't like this game.

It looks pretty, but is somehow shallow under the pretty surface. Definitely outstayed its welcome to me. The gunplay was just boring, and since its most of what you do in this game, I got my "enjoyment" out of it rather quickly.

I've seen the story yes. It doesn't strike me as anything spectacular. I don't get what the hype was about, and that's my problem.

Look, jesus, i spent five hours thinking about what to say about this game but words don't do it any justice. BUY THE GAME.
It's a game that will make you want to ask the developers all the questions you have just to find the truth about a game, but this is no ordinary game.
Solo puedo decir que el juego es grandioso, la banda sonora es genial y su historia es asombrosa
Played through a second time on the computer this time, loved it even more than the time on xbox 360.
really good
Amazing
one of the best games i've ever played, the ending will fuck you up

comstock go badoomba
Отличная игра 10/10. Прошел все три части+дополнения. Рекомендую к покупке BioShock: The Collection. Большое спасибо разработчикам.
Great story game with a mind bending ending. I loved the drinks that gave you superpowers and the city of Columbia. The game feels like a steampunk Disney movie and I like it. Would recommend on sale
Obra maestra

Ya know, I started the game with the expectation of Bioshock in the sky, and while the first hour didn't hold much value for me, the game is amazing in its own way. While it's missing the complex system of the first game, it has a much more emotional story, one that wrapped me up and made me stick through the first little while. And the game sprawls then, and creates characters and relationships that are interesting and sincere. I feel like I've just eaten an entire pie of mindbending apples.
这是一款非常好的游戏，特别是开头刚进入教堂的时候will the circle be unbroken这首歌响起我留在那听了好久 后面场景转了我好久 配乐真的非常棒
嗦不出话
不错的游戏，SF系，剧情其实挺老套，但玩起来剧情设计感觉确实不错，DLC也是完美完结了生化奇兵系列，不过我觉得这游戏没某些评论吹得那么夸张。
完美诠释了什么是第九艺术的作品，这一系列称得上前无古人，也注定后无来者   （10/10）
Honesty, my favorite video game of all time. Hands down.
You gotta play this, man!

I haven't seen a story in a game before.This game is masterpiece and processed skilfully with amazing details and science.After finishing game you will be very amazed and respect for it,I promise!  ;)
谈一下作为一名中文玩家的感受，总体来说这是一款不错的游戏， 剧情，画面，战斗系统设计的都可圈可点，各有特色，任务对白很搞笑，特别是一开始乱入的一对男女，对话充满黑色幽默。制作者在本作中表现了对中国，哦不，大清满满的恶意，扶清灭洋出现的那一刻，我的眼睛都要被亮瞎了，太特么恶搞了。有些国人煞有介事的的表示这部作品涉嫌辱华，所以这次要跟中国人民道歉的列表里又喜加一了，哈哈

非常棒的FPS，与前作的诡异暗黑画风不同，生化奇兵无限更偏向于童话卡通式的画风。但不变的是丰富引人入胜的情节以及带有讽刺揭露黑暗的种种主线细节。对于我这种文学爱好者而言，暗示性细节处理是最会让我眼前一亮和惊喜的。想让我给一个作品（游戏、电影、小说等）高分，除了精彩的剧情以及特别的策划设计，这种东西不可缺少。“Don't disappointed us！”没有黑暗只存光明的世界？那是不存在的。黑暗永远隐于光明之下。你只感受到了生活的美好？那是因为接触到黑暗的人已然倒下。
супер игра
感觉这个2013年的游戏真的非常好，从游戏性和内容做的都非常到位。不是所有的游戏都叫第9艺术，但是这款游戏绝对是
Best bioshock in my opinion
真正的第九艺术 剧情满分 高中时期玩的时候满是震惊 但玩完之后却一脸懵 之后各种查讲解才大致明白了些 后来又玩了第二遍 最后 超级喜欢伊丽莎白小姐姐 伊丽莎白失手杀完人后 剪掉长发变成小御姐真的把我震撼到了

One of the best FPS games ever made. The variety of guns and enemies is very good and the skyline ride is a nice touch. It's a fast shooter that never really slows down at any point. It's about as difficult as an FPS needs to be.
最后一段演出，可以说是艺术！

-Awesome graphic
-Rich Story
为何会闷死布克啊0.0
Feels like a standalone from the series and less dark. Love the animation style and the world has some freedom to explore for loot. Works better than the older games of the series...

Great FPS game with a solid story! The Bioshock Infinite is really an immersive game that makes you feel the world. Really love the AI Companion System in the game!
The only thing I regret is finishing the game.
非常完美，无论是剧情还是画风，世界观的设定也是没谁了

Döneminin ilerisinde grafiklerle  sanat eseri tadında çizimler içeriyor.Bir bölümde saatlerce kalsanız sıkılmazsınız.Ayrıca kafa dağıtıcak bir oyun değil ,tam tersine kafa çalışıtıracak bir hikayeye ve sona sahip.
a very good FPS for pro players

Gerçekten güzel ve tatmin edici bir oyun. hikayeyi ilerleyişi steampunk havasını algılayabilmek için dialogları ve olayları yakından takip etmek gerekli. oyunun atmosferini yakalamak çok zor değil ve yakaladığınız anda oyunun bitmemesini istiyorsunuz. benim oynayıp bitirdiğim dünyadan iletişimimi kesebilen ender oyunlardan. steampunk sever olarak yeri zaten apayrı. alın kesinlikle değecek.

Superb story. An interesting and unique world satricially depicting a fanatic Christian city. Graphics are still pretty good today. The characters aren't as strong as a game like The Last of Us but still well developed and interesting. Combat is pretty good but nothing speical and a bit repetitive. Overall a fantastic game driven by its world, story and characters, 9/10

gameplay pretty shittyy

overall this is a disappointment

10/10
Grandioso juego, me encantan los personajes y su ambientacion. 11/10
Voll gut!
great game does stuff

Aż ciężko uwierzyć, jak dobre jest Infinite. Gdyby granie w gry było przedmiotem szkolnym, Bioshock Infinite byłby lekturą obowiązkową. Fabuła jest jednocześnie absurdalna, intrygująca, zaskakująca, przewidywalna (ale w pozytywnym sensie!) i w pewnym stopniu wiarygodna. Pomimo upływu lat grafika wciąż jest przepiękna, postawiono bowiem na jakość wykonania i styl estetyczny, a nie na najnowsze technologie i rzucanie w gracza efektami graficznymi. Do Infinite chce się wracać, podobnie jak do pierwszego Bioshocka. Poziomy są rozległe, opcji taktycznych i kombinacji mocy jest bardzo wiele, gameplay praktycznie nigdy się nie nudzi. Świat gry jest intrygujący i zachwycający, w tej grze po prostu chce się być. 
Polecam z czystym sumieniem każdemu graczowi.
game suck lol
incredible good
Elizabeth

Combat mechanic is somewhat generic, but hell, the style of this game and story is the one and only, ive completed this game on my console few years ago, and im going to do that again on my PC, really worth every penny even if it's not for sale

One of the GREATEST story games of this generation, right up there with Fallout 4 and GTA V. Never played a bioshock game before, but regardless this game told quite possibly the best story of any game, ever! 10/10 all day, I cant belive that I only just now played this game in 2017, despite it's release being back in 2013. I would recommend this game to anyone that wants a fantastic, FPS story  game.

La verdad tenia grandes expectativas con este juego, y debo decir que las cumplió todas, es un excelente título, bien optimizado, gráficos excelentes, su jugabilidad 10/10 y en especial su historia es excelente, una obra maestra que vale la pena totalmente jugarla, incluso al final te deja con ganas de más, juegazo 10/10
Лучшие часы моей жизни
Good plot twist and extraordinary graphics
Best game I've ever played. Fantastic story. Fun gameplay. Aesthetic setting. 11/10

Best fps I've ever played, in my own opinion. Not only is the gameplay super fun and different, but the storyline is amazing too. Loved how customizeable gameplay is, being able to upgrade weapons and vigors and different armor. Hard to say whether I liked bioshock one or infinite better, but infinite was less confusing and easier. Soundtrack is also great, heck this is just one cool game. Only problem I have with this game was the battle with [spoiler] Lady Comstock because it's hard as fuck in hard difficulty and took me like 3000 tries [/spoiler] but other than that, yeah reccomended even now when it's a super old game
Magnifique
By far one of my favorite games. The story is engrossing, the music is beautiful, the characters are interesting and the gameplay is fun.
historia marcante

Uma verdadeira obra de arte,otima jogabilidade dificuldade muito bem equilibrada os graficos eu nem preciso falar,são de ficar babando,excelente historia assim como os anteriores,e muito bem otimizado rodando em 1080p ultra a 120 FPS  na RX 470 altamente recomendado, com certeza uma das melhores aquisições na steam ate hoje
Recomendadisimo, graficamente es hermoso, las fisicas de los enemigos estan super bien hechas, la historia es super interesante y te engancha con un final perfecto, lo mejor de todo.. Elizabeth.

No es la maravilla que te quieren vender pero tampoco es un mal juego, en general llega a ser divertido, tampoco hay mucho más que añadir, classic shooter en el que tiras hechizos con la mano de las pajas si eres zurdo, la historia hay quien piensa que es buena y tiene sentido, hay otros que no, juzga por tí mismo y únete al club de los que pensamos que el final tiene menos sentido que un dado redondo.
Very great game can only recommend it :)
From the Five Games I got this Steam Summer Sale, this is definetly the best. Very nice Game Mechanic

Pros
- Good graphics 
- Well optimized (90 FPS on Ultra)
- Amazing story
- Extremly unique and fun combat
- No bugs/glitches (throughout my entire time playing)
Cons
- I honestly cant think of any besides I would have liked the story to be a bit longer.
Overall I cannot recommend this game enough It truly is a masterpeice 10/10.

This game is amazing!

This way and still is one of my favorite games. The story is great, and while the everyone is really confusing, I liked it a lot, which is more than I can say for many of the games I have played. The actual combat of the game is pretty standard fps, with special super powers, but not terribly difficult. So it should probably be played more for the storyline than any challenging combat.
A wonderful, wonderful game.
